Comment: Canadians are already leaving American products on the shelves.Â  Chicken, produce, canned goods, baked goods....   If you go into a grocery store in Canada right now, you'll see red maple leaves on products letting consumers know at a glance which products are Canadian.   And as a Canadian, if I can't find a Canadian product, I'll buy a substitute from any other country except America.   It's not just the tariffs. I'm doing something I've never done in my life...but I'm not going to risk buying American if US food regulations go into the trash can.
